00002 #ifndef HBOND_SURFACES_SCORE_HEADER_INCLUDED

00005 #include <point_and_surf_score.H> 
00006 
00007 namespace ASCbase{
00008 
00009 class HbondSurfacesScore : public point_and_surf_score{
00010 public:
00011   typedef std::less<my_float_t>         score_cmp;  
00012 
00013   typedef std::vector<ModelHbondSurfaces::m_surf_vci>::const_iterator
00014     m_cap_iters_vci;
00015 
00017   HbondSurfacesScore() : point_and_surf_score() 
00018   { A_num_polar_pts = 0; }
00019 
00021   virtual
00022   ~HbondSurfacesScore()
00023   { ; }
00024 
00027 
00033   //template< class align_T_iterator >my_float_t 
00034   my_float_t
00035   score(const ModelSitemap &model, const DbaseSitemap& dbase, 
00036         rigid_align_t *scores)
00037         //align_T_iterator scores)
00038   {
00039     //my_float_t old_score = point_and_surf_score::score(model, dbase, scores);
00040     point_and_surf_score::score(model, dbase, scores);
00041   
00042     std::vector<my_float_t> &sums = scores->terms;
00043     uint start_idx = sums.size();
00044     sums.resize(sums.size() + A_num_terms);
00045     std::fill(sums.end() - A_num_terms, sums.end(), 0.0);
00046     A_num_polar_pts = 0;
00047 
00048   
00049   #if 0  
00050    0) (17) Number of query donor/acceptor group matches
00051    1) (18) sum of dot product weighted point matches AA,DD
00052    2) (19) sum of linear error weighted matches (tol - dist) / tol -- AA, DD
00053    3) (20) sum of squared error weighted matches (tol - dist) / tol -- AA, DD
00054    4) (21) sum of linear error * dot product weighted matches -- AA, DD
00055    5) (22) sum of squared error * dot product weighted matches -- AA, DD
00056    6) (23) Number of query doneptor group matches
00057    7) (24) sum of dot product weighted point matches (doneptors)
00058    8) (25) sum of linear error weighted matches (tol - dist) / tol -- doneptors
00059    9) (26) sum of squared error weighted matches (tol - dist) / tol -- doneptors
00060    10) (27) sum of linear error * dot product weighted matches -- doneptors
00061    11) (28) sum of squared error * dot product weighted matches -- doneptors
00062    12) (29) underestimate of complementary surface area
00063   #endif
00064   
00065     HbondSurfaces<hbond_surface_t>& db_surfs = dbase.hbond_surfaces();
00066     const ModelHbondSurfaces* model_surfs = model.model_hbond_surfaces();
00067   
00068     // Save correlated points for ICP in the future
00069   
00070     // Use brute force search for now -- just get this thing coded
00071     std::vector<model_hbond_surf_t>::const_iterator m_surf_iter;
00072     for(m_surf_iter = model_surfs->surf_caps_begin();
00073         m_surf_iter != model_surfs->surf_caps_end(); ++m_surf_iter){
00074       const model_hbond_surf_t& m_surf = *m_surf_iter;
00075       A_num_polar_pts += m_surf.num_verts();
00076   
00077   /*
00078         std::cout << "Query HB cap for residue (" << m_surf.atom->chainID << ") "
00079                   << PDB_residues::residue_to_string(m_surf.atom->res)
00080                   << m_surf.atom->res_num << " "
00081                   << PDB_residues::atom_to_string(m_surf.atom->name) << std::endl;
00082   */
00083   
00084       uint N = m_surf.num_terms() * m_surf.num_verts();
00085       my_float_t* AA_DD_terms = new my_float_t[N];
00086       my_float_t* doneptor_terms = new my_float_t[N];
00087       my_float_t surface_area;
00088       m_surf.compute_best_terms(db_surfs.surf_caps_begin(),
00089                                 db_surfs.surf_caps_end(), AA_DD_terms, 
00090                                 doneptor_terms, &surface_area, A_max_corr_dist);
00091    
00092       // Sum the point contributions
00093       const uint doneptor_idx = start_idx + m_surf.num_terms();
00094       uint AA_DD_pt_cnt = 0;
00095       uint doneptor_pt_cnt = 0;
00096       for(uint j = 0; j < m_surf.num_verts(); ++j){
00097         if(AA_DD_terms[j*m_surf.num_terms()]) ++AA_DD_pt_cnt;
00098         else if(doneptor_terms[j*m_surf.num_terms()]) ++doneptor_pt_cnt;
00099   
00100         // We want count of groups not points for terms 0 & 6
00101         for(uint i = 1; i < m_surf.num_terms(); ++i){ 
00102           sums[start_idx + i] += AA_DD_terms[j*m_surf.num_terms() + i];
00103           sums[doneptor_idx + i] += doneptor_terms[j*m_surf.num_terms() + i];
00104         }
00105       }
00106   
00107       if(AA_DD_pt_cnt > 0 && AA_DD_pt_cnt > doneptor_pt_cnt) ++sums[start_idx];
00108       else if(doneptor_pt_cnt > 0) ++sums[doneptor_idx];
00109   
00110       sums[start_idx + 12] += surface_area;
00111   
00112       delete [] AA_DD_terms;
00113       delete [] doneptor_terms;
00114     }
00115   
00116     if(scale_terms()){
00117       // The terms before start_idx were scaled in the base class
00118       std::vector<my_float_t>::const_iterator max_val =
00119         model.get_max_feature_vals().begin() + start_idx;
00120       std::vector<my_float_t>::iterator t = sums.begin() + start_idx;
00121       for( ; t < sums.end(); ++t, ++max_val) *t /= *max_val;
00122   
00123       return SCALED_CONSTANT_TERM + 
00124              SCALED_SURFACE_RMSE_W * sums[12] + 
00125              SCALED_QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DD_OR_AA_SUM_W * sums[start_idx + 4] +
00126              SCALED_QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DNEPTOR_SUM_W * sums[start_idx + 10];
00127     }else{
00128       return CONSTANT_TERM + 
00129              SURFACE_RMSE_W * sums[12] + 
00130              QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DD_OR_AA_SUM_W * sums[start_idx + 4] +
00131              QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DNEPTOR_SUM_W * sums[start_idx + 10];
00132     }
00133   
00134   }
00135 
00136   virtual my_float_t
00137   polar_correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model, my_float_t **vertices_ptr,
00138                         my_float_t **closest_pts_ptr, size_t *npts) const;
00139 
00140   virtual void
00141   polar_correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model,
00142                         m_cap_iters_vci cap_iters_beg,
00143                         m_cap_iters_vci cap_iters_end,
00144                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *q_pts,
00145                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *corr_pts) const;
00146 
00147   inline bool
00148   uses_hbond_surfaces()
00149   { return true; }
00150 
00151 private:
00152   size_t A_num_polar_pts;  
00153   static const std::string A_fname;   
00154   static const uint A_num_terms;
00155   static const my_float_t A_max_corr_dist;
00156   static const my_float_t CONSTANT_TERM;
00157   static const my_float_t SURFACE_RMSE_W;
00158   static const my_float_t QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DD_OR_AA_SUM_W;
00159   static const my_float_t QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DNEPTOR_SUM_W;
00160   static const my_float_t SCALED_CONSTANT_TERM;
00161   static const my_float_t SCALED_SURFACE_RMSE_W;
00162   static const my_float_t SCALED_QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DD_OR_AA_SUM_W;
00163   static const my_float_t SCALED_QUAD_DIST_N_DOT_PROD_DNEPTOR_SUM_W;
00164 };
